casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Antone Lamont BELL. No. 347P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Oct. 14, 2015. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Antone Lamont Bell, for Bell, Antone Lamont. L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 13th of October 2015 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Robeson County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of October 2015."
